Summary Note:
Veenhoven De Jong Mulders and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Veenhoven De Jong Mulders is a seasoned professional with over 40 years of experience.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Veenhoven De Jong Mulders has been happily married to Anne since 1990. Their children are named Francisca, Schipper and Joke.
Education Background:
In 1981, Veenhoven graduated from Willem de Zwijger College Bussum with a secondary school diploma.
He then attended Tio University of Applied Sciences, which he graduated in 1985.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 40 years, Veenhoven De Jong Mulders brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Veenhoven De Jong Mulders began his professional journey as a Ship Broker at Transmediterránea S.A. in 1985, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Shipping Company Owner at Elcano Shipping Company S.A., where he continued to grow professionally from 1987 till retirement.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 900000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns house in Castellón de la Plana, where he resides. It is worth 1320000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
